avatar.label: New photo

news.label: News of the {platform} service (useful information for carpooling, and new services or new features)

confirmation.content:
Please note, by unsubscribing from these service news, you will no longer receive any information on all of the following:
  • new platform features and services
  • carpooling news from your region
  • news from your communities
  • personalized support

Are you sure you want to unsubscribe?
confirmation.title: Confirmation of ending subscription

news.tooltip: The news of the service are emails that used only to keep you informed of the changes to the service and promote your practice of carpooling. Such as updates to the platform or emails from the referent of a community to which you belong. This information may concern updates to the platform. No commercial solicitation is made via these emails.

errors.valid: The email address must be in the right format

tooltips.notVerified: Your email address is not verified

errors.notadult: You must be 16 years old to register on the platform

dialogEmail.title: You have changed your email address
dialogEmail.content:
You have changed your email address.

If you continue, an email validating your email address will be sent to you, and you will be logged out.

Do you want to continue?

buttons.confirmUpdate: I am changing my email address

content.errorCommunities:
As a referrer of a community you cannot delete your account as long as you are a referrer.
Contact Technical Support to change your referrer or delete that community.
content.errorEvents:
As the author of an event that is still to come,
you cannot delete your account while you are the author of the event or while it is still to come.
Contact Technical Support to change the author of the event or ask for it to be deleted, or wait until the event has passed.
content.deleteAccount:
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
This action is irreversible.
It will result in :
- deleting all your personal data
- deleting all your messages exchanged with other users
- making you anonymous in the carpooling archives of other carpoolers
- delete all still active carpool proposals you have
- decline all current carpool requests
- cancel all planned carpools

Do you confirm?

token.inputError: The validation code consists of 4 digits.

tooltips.notVerified: Your mobile number is not verified

errors.valid: The phone number must be valid

label.all: Visible on posting the proposal, by all subscribers
label.restricted: Visible only after accepting the carpooling , only by participants
